vendors.description: Handcrafted jewelry, crystals, and spiritual art pieces including dream catchers and healing stones.
Local ceramic art, pottery bowls, vases, and custom commissioned pieces made from regional clay.
Hand-woven textiles, tapestries, scarves, and organic fiber art using traditional techniques.
Original paintings, prints, and canvas art featuring local landscapes and nature scenes.
Handforged metal sculptures, garden art, decorative ironwork, and stone carvings.
